summary: BuildRequest contains no stated requirements or acceptance criteria. The diff introduces multiple backend and frontend changes (data migration and portfolio site/content updates) that were not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Added backend data migration module converting old Project/Resume maps into new uploadedFiles/uploadedCVs structures.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; this functionality is not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified backend actor to store uploaded project files and CV URLs, including addCV/addFile APIs and query endpoints (getAllFiles/getFilesCount), and wiring migration run.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these API/data model changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/added frontend portfolio content data (projects and case studies JSON) including generated asset thumbnail paths and case study section content.
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; content updates are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced/updated many frontend components and behaviors per summaries (landing/case study navigation, sticky header link reorder, resume CTA behavior, smooth scrolling, reduced-motion-aware reveal animations, styling/tailwind updates, etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirements were provided in the BuildRequest; these UI/UX changes are not requested.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata describing a portfolio website with multiple REQ entries (REQ-1..REQ-6 etc.).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest lists no requirements; adding a requirement-tracking state file content is unrequested.
